text: This is a listing of the horses that finished in either first, second, or third place and the number of starters in the Horatius Stakes (1994-present), an American Thoroughbred Stakes race for three-year-olds at six furlongs run on dirt at Laurel Park Racecourse in Laurel, Maryland. 2007 Maryland Jockey Club Media Guide, page 236 on March 3, 2007. {| class = "wikitable sortable" | border="1" cellpadding="0" style="border-collapse: collapse; font-size:90%" |- bgcolor="#DACAA5" align="center" | width="50px" | Year | width="130px" | Winner | width="125px" | Second | width="120px" | Third | width="55px" |Starters |- bgcolor="#eeeeee" | align=center|2015 | No Race | No Race | No Race | align=center|0 |- bgcolor="#eeeeee" | align=center|2014 | No Race | No Race | No Race | align=center|0 |- bgcolor="#eeeeee" | align=center|2013 | No Race | No Race | No Race | align=center|0 |- bgcolor="#eeeeee" | align=center|2012 | No Race | No Race | No Race | align=center|0 |- bgcolor="#eeeeee" | align=center|2011 | No Race | No Race | No Race | align=center|0 |- bgcolor="#eeeeee" | align=center|2010 | No Race | No Race | No Race | align=center|0 |- bgcolor="#eeeeee" | align=center|2009 | No Race | No Race | No Race | align=center|0 |- | align=center|2008 | Vanderkaay | Ghostly Thunder | Vigors Storm | align=center|n/a |- | align=center|2007 | Call Me Clash | Casey Doon | Heart Throbbin' | align=center|n/a |- | align=center|2006 | Ah Day | Eagle Head | Great Seneca | align=center|n/a |- | align=center|2005 | Diamond Wildcat | Distinctive Trick | Monster Chaser | align=center|n/a |- | align=center|2004 | Basketball Court | Matsui | Snow Eagle | align=center|n/a |- | align=center|2003 | Deadline | Gators N Bears | Mt.
